plot: Even in Shreveport, Louisiana, people are now accepting the fact that zombies roam the streets... Werewolves prey on the unsuspecting... and crossing the wrong granny can lead to a fate ...
title: Stiff'd
plot_es: Even in Shreveport, Louisiana, people are now accepting the fact that zombies roam the streets... Werewolves prey on the unsuspecting... and crossing the wrong granny can lead to a fate ...
